title: Timer
welcomeMessage.title: Thanks for using the timer app.
welcomeMessage.detail: I'll show you how to use it.
description.timerAction: You can start, stop, and reset the timer by operating here.
description.timerTitle: You can change the name of the timer.
description.timerCount: You can change the time by touching the time on the timer.
description.timerDelete: You can delete the timer by clicking here.
description.timerAdd: You can add more timers by clicking here.
description.timerTheme: You can change theme color by clicking here.
header.menu.timer.title: Add Timer
